title: Ep. #6 | HENRY, PARK HYO SHIN, and OH MY GIRL
description:
We are back!


Welcome to Episode 6 of the Kpop Daebak show with Eric Nam! In this episode, Eric talks about Henry Lau's new single ‘Untitled Love Song,' the romantic and sad song ‘Goodbye’ by Park Hyo Shin, and Oh My Girl’s new release ‘The Fifth Season'. Eric also touches on Infinite Nam Woohyun's 3rd EP and Chancellor's new single 'Angel'. 


Also! what happens behind the stage of music shows in Korea? Where are the snacks? and WHY ARE YOU YELLING AT ME???!!! Don’t forget to check out Eric's new single ‘Runaway’ out now! We hope you enjoy the show! If you’re a Nam and you’re out there...Hello!


As always, if you enjoy this podcast, make sure to subscribe and leave us a comment / rating on iTunes, Spotify, Soundcloud and YouTube. It helps us tremendously :).


Thank you for listening, Daebak Show family!


Episodes are presented by @thedivestudios


Connect with us on all social media platforms @daebakshow and at http://www.divestudios.io/daebakshow !


SUPPORT & JOIN DIVE Studios' Patreon: https://www.patreon.com/divestudios


#EricNam #에릭남 #DaebakShow #HenryLau #ParkHyoShin #NamWoohyun #DIVEStudios
